name: Chocolypse
description:
You are one of the last few chocolates left on the earth. The humans are desperate for chocolate and hence they have invaded your home and now need to survive. 

Take your cocoa bean launcher and fight the humans to survive!

Controls

WASD - To move

Mouse - To aim

Press P - To open/close the shop

There are going to be 5 waves with increasing difficulty.

There are 2 types of humans, the normal ones, the fat ones.

The Shop

There are 3 types of upgrades. Shooting Damage, shoot speed and health.
